reviews.sentence: The room had a very comfortable bed good workspace and the dÃ © cor was very nice. The common areas were beautiful and relaxing. There was even wine and cheese offered in the lobby in the afternoon. The breakfast buffet was also well done many choicesWould be nice if there was a microwave.

Modern Upscale Comfortable. The staff are excellent attentive and focused on delivering customer comfort. For example when one of the front desk agents answered my question about their being a refrigerator in the room the other was quick to point out how I would find it in the room behind a door that looks like drawers under the TVit is right on El Camino in Sunyvale next to The Fish Market my favorite every day restaurant during business trips to this area so convenient and pleasant.

The room had a refrigerator but no microwave. I went downstairs to have breakfast before leaving for work and was asked if I had a voucher. I said no just my hotel room key. I grabbed a plate and put some sausages and an omelet on it and went back to my table. I was then greeted with a bill for 16 not including tip. I did not realize that the breakfast did not come with the room. I do not mind paying a reasonable amount for a quick bite but was a bit shocked when the bill was so high. I did not eat breakfast there for the remainder of my trip.

Wonderful hotel. So glad I found this hotel. it is very close to one of my accounts that I have to visit fairly often so I will definitely come back. The room was nicely decorated reminded me of the W Hotel very stylish and modern. What I loved most was the Sleep Number bed. So comfy. It was clean quiet and the price was great.

Domain hotel reviews. 1. Nice room tub TV2. Excellent breakfast3. Good restaurants nearby4. Free coffee in the rom5. Nice walls color6. Attractive room lights7. Nice complementary breakfast. Cons. No free water.

Full of surprises. The hotel staff was very welcoming and the complimentary glass of champagne was a real treat after a long trip. Sleep number bed was also a welcome surprise. Room was quiet and very comfortable.

Unexpectedly Nice Visit. It was an unexpected stay that turned out to be a nice experience. The Grand Hotel in Sunyvale cancelled our reservation at 5 pm that day 2nd time on us which we will never go with again. so Expedia quickly helped us find The Domain Hotel. it is got a modern vibe which we found fun. Front desk was friendly and the rooms were straightforward and clean. The best part about the room was their the rain shower head loved the shower and a great way to end the day. We tried the breakfast and it was a good breakfast buffet nothing fancy but fine if you have time for breakfast the service was excellent.

Spacious and Clean Room Excellent Value. Room was very clean and spacious compared to several other hotel locations I have stayed. All appliances and amenities were in tip top shape and appeared quite new and fully functional. It would have been nice to have a complimentary breakfast but that may be asking too much. Overall it was one of the most pleasant rooms considering price and value that I stayed in during my ten days in California. Thank you for a good experience at the Domain Hotel.

Attending the International Soccer Game. The front desk staff Stephanie Sam and Isabele were excellent the very friendly and knowledgeable about the surrounding areas Absolutely fantastic stay my room was very clean and smelled great great breakfast service. Well worth the money I will stay here again.
Great location. The meeting room was large and food was good.

Located near majority of good restaurants. Near to San Jose airport which makes it convenient to travel from airport. Rooms are spacious with comfortable bed. Rooms are equipped with TV Study table and chair. Small refrigerator is also provided for Keeping drinks cold. Bathroom is very nice.

Expected more. I was excited to stay at your hotel. But my overall experience of it was not good. I booked he domain suite which should have been the best too in the hotel. But one of the TVS did not have a remote the bed was not a sleep number bed and it had urine stains on the mattress. I was extremely disgusted. The only offered me 48 dollars off.

My room had a urine type liquid in the shower and the sink was also dirty. After notify the staff it took another call to the front desk and 1 hour before they came to clean it. They did nothing wrt to reducing my rate or offering another room.
Okay. Beds were comfortable and Wifi worked. No hot water for showers sometimes. Some of the staff had a real attitude problem Defensive and rude.
Mediocre. It was very comfortable and loved the long desk. Power was easily to get to. The free WiFi was pretty fast too. The lack of a real window view was rough. Elevador was also below par.
Lack of security. Any one can access all hotel floors from outside. Shower curtain was too short floors would get wet each time.

Decent comfortable stay with great restaurants nearby. Comfortable and good location. There were 2 amazing restaurants right next door to hotel fish market and tanto which was very convenient. Pool was closed for maintenance so could not use it. Upon checkin reception staff tried to put me in a room without windows and was stating it is due to the fact that hotel is fully booked and no other rooms r available. Upon insistence suddenly another room become available in 5 min. That guy was surely lying and trying to get rid of their worst room. The other assigned room was good.
Exceptional. clean room. good location. friendly staff. good value. Room is not quite sound approve you can hear your neighbors tv talk and shower noise.

Good. Nice firm bed and clean bathroom. The flow restrictor on the bathroom basin tap is just ridiculous the water trickles out at a pathetically slow rate the shower pressure is fine. A small issue but a very annoying one.

Nice Style and Service. Very clean and the hotel did a good job styling the lobby and rooms. I stayed on the first floor and unfortunately the last 2 nights there a family with kids where in the room above me. You could here them jumping around early in the morning. I would suggest booking a top level room to avoid the sound problem with people walking above you. Otherwise I enjoyed my stay.
